Detailed Description

Osimo's BBCode parser.

Author:
Ryan LeFevre

Definition at line 7 of file bbparser.class.php.

Member Function Documentation

OsimoBBParser (  ) 

Class constructor. Registers itself with the debugging module and loads all of the BBCode defaults.

Definition at line 17 of file bbparser.class.php.

addSimple ( $  tag  ) 

Adds an additional BBCode parsing rule to the parser. A "simple" BBCode is one that cannot take arguments within the opening tag.

Parameters:
mixed $tag

Definition at line 158 of file bbparser.class.php.

addFancy ( $  tag  ) 

Adds an additional BBCode parsing rule to the parser. A "fancy" BBCode is one that can take arguments within the opening tag.

Parameters:
mixed $tag

Definition at line 192 of file bbparser.class.php.

parse ( $  content,
&$  count = false 
)

Used for actually parsing content with BBCode in it based on the BBCode rules set up ahead of time (usually automatically by the constructor).

Parameters:
String $content The content to be parsed.
int $count (optional, reference) The number of tags parsed (currently buggy and not accurate)
Returns:
The parsed String with all BBCode converted to HTML.
